Interchange of limit

2. (Point 20) Competency CO1

Explain the statement below whether it is true or it is not true. Give a reason such as a counterexample or the statement of a theorem etc.

  1. If a sequence of continuous functions converges uniformly to another function on a domain A, then the limit function has to be continuous on A .
  2. If a sequence of continuous functions converges pointwise to another function on a domain A, then the limit function has to be continuous on A?
